16:28 <cjd> there seems to be a flickering bug in the wysiwyg-war module and it's breaking the release.  
16:28 <cjd> https://ezcrypt.it/8c5n#2Gc3tb5QOIC8h5G7ruTVKgha  
16:29 <cjd> it's trying to copy /classes/ to wxyz.jar which seems wrong, not sure if I should patch it with <type>jar</type> or hold the release until it's fixed by someone who knows better

23:02 <jssolichin> has quit  
23:32 <ries> Gents, when I go to xwiki/bin/edit/Dashboard/WebHome to try to edit my dashboard, it doesn't allow me that in a way I was reading here : http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Dashboard+Macro  
23:37 <+sburjan`> ries: click on edit -> Inline  
23:37 <ries> sburjan`: yup!  
23:37 <+sburjan`> and you shouldn't edit Dashboard/WebHome  
23:38 <ries> sburjan`: Why not?  
23:38 <+sburjan`> because that is used as a template for the all the default Dashboards in your wiki  
23:38 <+sburjan`> you should edit Main/WebHome  
23:38 <ries> yes, that  makes sense..  
23:51 <ries> I think I cracked it up… can I just re-import the XAR and I will be fine? or should I delete the database and re-install xwiki?  
23:51 <+sburjan`> what did you break ?  
23:52 <ries> I think I deleted the 'homepage'  
23:52 <+sburjan`> you can restore it  
23:52 <ries> when I did a rsstore it's stating 'Unknown Macro: spaces'  
23:52 <+sburjan`> from the DOcument Index  
23:52 <+sburjan`> re-save the page if you gat Unknown Macro  
23:54 <ries> I did a inline edit  
23:54 <ries> then save and view  
23:54 <+sburjan`> same result ?  
23:54 <ries> yes  
23:54 <jvdrean> has quit  
23:55 <+sburjan`> are you logged as Admin ?  
23:55 <ries> as superadmin  
23:55 <+sburjan`> you don't need superadmin :)  
23:55 <ries> I couldn't get logged in with Admin/admin for some reason  
23:55 <+sburjan`> try re-saving Dashboard/WebHome  
23:55 <+sburjan`> then something is bag with your wiki  
23:55 <+sburjan`> \*bad  
23:58 <ries> I will re-install it---  
23:58 <ries> it's a new installation so it's no biggy  
23:58 <+sburjan`> okay  
23:58 <ries> still learning and it's quick challanging  
23:58 <+sburjan`> remember, superadmin is only for exceptional cases  
23:58 <+sburjan`> it must work with Admin/admin  
23:58 <ries> I will create a Admin account… see how that works out  
23:59 <+sburjan`> you don't have to create  
23:59 <+sburjan`> it is already created out of the box  
23:59 <+sburjan`> just beware, XWiki is case sensitive, so Admin not equal with admin  
23:59 <ries> after I imported the XAR I couldn't get logged in with it  
23:59 <ries> I tried Admin as the username and admin as the password  
23:59 <+sburjan`> impossible :)  
23:59 <+sburjan`> Admin/admin  
23:59 <+sburjan`> note the capital A from the username
